title: Ashe shouldn't be a starter champion
body: She lacks the damage to be a starter champion, and with a kit so focused around utility, it seems like a horribly poor choice for starters to use.

replies.body:
When you first play League of Legends with no experience of any other MMO Game you wanna learn the basics first and Ashe is great for this: 

* Has a good vision spell.
* Global ranged ult.
* Has good basic starting spells.
* Sure she lacks damage but she has slows and above average attack speed.

I reckon Riot did a good job putting Ashe in the starter champions: Garen, Ashe, Ryze. (Mixture of tank and both damage types and basic cc combos)

I can't count the number of times I've seen beginners fire the E at enemies for damage. In a land where duo top happens all the time, most of the time they don't care about vision or anything about that. She's just going to get stomped by basically every other starter champ that can click you for kill.

> I can't count the number of times I've seen beginners fire the E at enemies for damage.

Yeah, I will agree I have seen and I did it myself when I started firing my hawk shot for damage when it only gives vision. But I improved and I try to help others improve from the mistakes they make so they hopefully don't do it again.

> In a land where duo top happens all the time, most of the time they don't care about vision or anything about that.

These Summoners Aren't in the meta. Because, their basically bronze players. (expect they might have potential after they learn more) But like come on man these people don't care about vision because they don't know what a jungler is other lanes don't roam to then baron/dragon jungle camps are just frozen minions till you hit em.

> She's just going to get stomped by basically every other starter champ that can click you for kill.

Yeah well you are going to get stomped very first game of norms if you have a bunch of new people against some smurfs. (because there are a lot of gold+ smurfs in low levels) so you get better at playing Ashe then evolve into playing other marksman or another play style. These new Summoners aren't going to be acing Sivir or Corki or Varus. until they learn the basics of ADC then they an evolve into trying more advanced champions Like Sivir, Lucian or Vayne.
